title: MD
biography: Walter A. Wohlgemuth is a German radiologist and neuroradiologist and Director of the University Clinic and Policlinic of Radiology at the Martin-Luther-Universität Halle-Wittenberg.
aiSummary: Eckhard Nagel is a cardiology specialist with an H-index of 23 at University of Bayreuth (Member). Has been published in Scientific Electronic Library Online (São Paulo Research Foundation, Latin American and Caribbean Center on Health Sciences Information, Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Científico e Tecnológico), Science & Sports, International Journal of Sports Science & Coaching. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
